verses.verse: O praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, all ye nations <S%H1471><s%>: praise <S%H7623><s%> him <S%H523><s%>, all ye people.

For his merciful <S%H2617><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward us <S%H571><s%>: and the truth of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
